articles.description:
RT Lee Robinson
📣 The Next.js router is getting a major upgrade!
◆ Nested routes / layouts
◆ Client and server routing
◆ React 18 features – startTransition, Suspense
◆ Designed for Server Components
◆ 100% incrementally adoptable 🤯
Expect an RFC very soon 👀

RT Narb | narbeh.eth
This man is an absolute legend and fantastic ambassador for @developer_dao.  @dhaiwat10 has spent countless hours coding, onboarding, teaching, encouraging and inspiring people to build inside and outside the DAO.  He's going to be a stud hire if your looking for a DevRel
dhai.eth 🇺🇦: 📢 Some news! I have decided to commit to DevRel. I am making the switch. 
This means that I am looking for a new role and will appreciate all of your RTs, intros & vouches ❤️
You can read about my work here:
 https://dhaiwat.xyz/cv

articles.description:
RT Lit Protocol
New feature: Time Lock ⏱🔓
Keep resources encrypted or locked until a set time: 
You can also combine time locks with other access control conditions using “AND” + “OR” operators. https://developer.litprotocol.com/docs/accesscontrolconditions/evmbasicexamples/#timelock-time-based-access-control
